name: engine_state.transitions
description: Gets rid of object stats with no change in the engine state when compared to the previously reported stat.

metadata.comment: Date when the object stat was reported.
The organization ID for which the engine state object stat is reported.
The device ID for which the engine state object stat is reported.
The time in milliseconds at which the engine state object stat is reported

Corresponds to the engine state. 
0: Engine State Off
1: Engine State Idle
2: Engine State On

Corresponds to the engine state of the previously reported object stat. 
0: Engine State Off
1: Engine State Idle
2: Engine State On
